https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/aaeACUbBtLYj97AaU7UXCHOwCW0.jpg When a gunman killed five Amish children and injured five others in a Nickel Mines, Pennsylvania schoolhouse shooting in October of 2006, the world media attention rapidly turned from the tragic events to the extraordinary forgiveness demonstrated by the Amish community. Amish Grace
